name: Corporation Master
description:
Corporationmaster.com is a social, political, economic simulation game
where you can convert your Virtual Currency into Real Money. Each player
has an opportunity to work, train, trade goods, set up companies, build
corporations, gain military ranks, think about unique strategies and
much more. You can also enter the arena to show your power, fight with
your opponents and receive bonuses. Payout is through Paypal.
